definitions.definition: A rejection ; a vote against admitting someone.
A black ball used to indicate such a negative vote .
examples: Regardless how many other people may have voted to approve a candidate for membership, a single blackball will reject the candidate.

definitions.definition: A kind of large black sweet , a black-colored gobstopper .
A substance for blacking shoes, boots, etc. or for taking impressions of engraved work.
A game, a standardized version of the English version of eight-ball .

main_definition: ( countable ) A rejection ; a vote against admitting someone.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A black ball used to indicate such a negative vote .
( countable ) A kind of large black sweet , a black-colored gobstopper .
A substance for blacking shoes, boots, etc. or for taking impressions of engraved work.
( uncountable ) A game, a standardized version of the English version of eight-ball .
